T04sanss12u:1: tad evam araṇye vasan samādhānāya yujyate //
T04sanss12u:3: sa teṣām eva satvānām arthāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carann avikṣiptacitto bhavati /
T04sanss12u:7: laukikī dhyānôpapattir api tāvad vikṣiptacittasya durlabhā /
T04sanss12u:12: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittôtpādam upādāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvâkārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
T04sanss12u:13: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nânuvyañjanagrāhī /
T04sanss12u:14: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya cakṣurindriyeṇâsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya viharato 'bhidhyādaurmanasye 'nye vā pāpakâkuśalā dharmāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
T04sanss12u:21: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
T04sanss12u:23: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya manêndriyeṇâsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya pāpakāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
T04sanss12u:26: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi samāhitâvasthām asamāhitâvasthāṃ na vijahāti /
T04sanss12u:53: hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān asaṃbhūtān aniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyatîti vistaraḥ //
T04sanss12u:54: tatra līne manasi muditā bhāvanayôttejanaṃ kuryāt /
T04sanss12u:57: bahu kalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣi /
T04sanss12u:58: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyajati pramādaṃ yadi moktukāma /
T04sanss12u:61: mayôpamaṃ vitatham etat svapnôpamaṃ ca saṃskṛtam avekṣya na cirād bhaviṣyati viyogaḥ sarvapriyaiḥ /
T04sanss12u:63: udyujya yathā ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu /
T04sanss12u:64: mā jātu sraṃsaya vīryaṃ yāvan na budhyathā pravarabodhim /
T04sanss12u:67: jvalitaṃ tribhuvaṃ jaravyādhidukhair maraṇâgnipradīptam anātham idam /
T04sanss12u:68: bhavaniḥśaraṇe sada mūḍha jagad bhramati bhramaro yathā kumbhagataḥ //
T04sanss12u:70: adhruvaṃ tribhuvaṃ śaradabhranibhaṃ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi janmacyutiḥ /
T04sanss12u:71: girinadyasamaṃ laghuśīghrajavaṃ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe //
T04sanss12u:73: parivarttiṣu pañcagatiṣv abudhā yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakra bhramī //
T04sanss12u:75: pariṣiktam idaṃ kalipāśa jagat mṛgalubdhakapāśi yathâiva kapi //
T04sanss12u:76: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśokôpadrava kāmaguṇāḥ /
T04sanss12u:79: bhavatṛṣṇalatāya vivṛddhikarāḥ sabhayāḥ saraṇā sada kāmaguṇāḥ //
T04sanss12u:80: yathâgnikhadāḥ jvalitāḥ sabhayāḥ tatha kāmême viditâryajanaiḥ /
T04sanss12u:82: yatha sarpaśiro yatha mīḍhaghaṭaḥ tatha kāmême viditā viduṣām /
T04sanss12u:83: tatha śūlasāmā dvijapeśisamā yatha śvānakaraṃ kiśavaira tathôdakacandranibhêmi kāmaguṇāḥ pratibimbêvā girighoṣa yathā /
T04sanss12u:86: kṣaṇikāvasikêmi kāmaguṇāḥ tatha māyamarīcisamâlikôdakabudbudaphenasamā vitathāḥ parikalpasamutthita buddha budhaiḥ //
T04sanss12u:87: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priyêṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
T04sanss12u:90: parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narêva śūnyaṭavīm //
T04sanss12u:91: yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo narudānarataḥ tatha prītikaraḥ /
T04sanss12u:95: jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhato va yathā bhavati /
T04sanss12u:96: jarajīrṇâgāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune //
T04sanss12u:97: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṃ yatha mālulatā ghana śālavanam /
T04sanss12u:98: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo //
T04sanss12u:99: jara rūpa surūpavirūpakarī jara tejaharī balasthāmaharī /
T04sanss12u:100: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jarâujaharī //
T04sanss12u:101: bahurogaśatair ghanavyādhidukhaiḥ upasṛṣṭu jagaj jvalanêva mṛgāḥ /
T04sanss12u:102: jara vyādhigataṃ prasamīkṣya jagat dukhaniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu deśaya hī //
T04sanss12u:104: śiśirehi yathā himadhātu mahaṃ tṛṇagulmavanâuṣadhi ojaharo /
T04sanss12u:107: pratighātakaraḥ priyadveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūryu nabhe //
T04sanss12u:108: maraṇaṃ cyavanaṃ cyuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā /
T04sanss12u:110: maraṇaṃ vaśitān avaśīkurute maraṇaṃ harate nadi dāru yathā /
T04sanss12u:112: maraṇaṃ grasate bahu prāṇiśatān makaro va jalâkari bhūtagaṇān /
T04sanss12u:113: garuḍo uragaṃ mṛgarāja gaja jvalano va tṛṇâuṣadhibhūtagaṇam /
T04sanss12u:116: tad yathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaś catvāraḥ parvatâgaccheyur dṛḍhāḥ /
T04sanss12u:118: sāravanto 'khaṇḍâcchidrâsuṣirāḥ susaṃvṛtâikaghanā nabhaḥ spṛśantaḥ pṛthivīṃ côllikhantaḥ
T04sanss12u:120: sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena vā dravyamantrâuṣadhibhir vā nivartayitum /
T04sanss12u:121: evam eva mahārāja catvārîmāni mahābhayāny āgacchanti yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena
T04sanss12u:131: tad yathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇam anupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti /
T04sanss12u:132: sa ca mṛgo 'tibalaṃ vyāḍamukham āsādya vivaśo bhavati /
T04sanss12u:133: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenâpagatamadasyâparāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu
T04sanss12u:137: kākino 'dvitīyasyâsahāyasyêmaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokam ākrāmato mahāpathaṃ vrajato
T04sanss12u:138: mahākāntāraṃ praviśato mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya mahândhakāraṃ pratipadyamānasya
T04sanss12u:140: trāṇaṃ nânyac charaṇaṃ nânyat parāyaṇam ṛte dharmāt /
T04sanss12u:141: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss12u:153: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenâpagatamadasyâtrāṇasyâśaraṇasyâparāyaṇasya nânyat trāṇaṃ nânyat parāyaṇam anyatra dharmāt /
T04sanss12u:154: tasmāt tarhi te mahārājânityatânudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ kṣayavyayânudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ maraṇabhayabhītena /
T04sanss12u:155: dharmeṇâiva te mahārāja rājyaṃ kārayitavyaṃ nâdharmeṇa /
T04sanss12u:158: asyâpi te mahārājâtmabhāvasyâivaṃ suciram api parirakṣitasya suciram api śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyâsvādanīyena saṃtarpitasya saṃpravāritasya
T04sanss12u:160: evaṃ kāśikauśeyadūkūlapattrôrṇākṣaumâdibhir vastraviśeṣair ācchāditasya caramaśayanâvasthitasya vividhasvedâmbuklinnamalinavasanâvṛtasya kālakriyā bhaviṣyati /
T04sanss12u:161: evam api te mahārāja snānânulepanavāsadhūpapuṣpasurabhigandhasyâtmabhāvasya na cireṇa durgandhatā bhaviṣyati /
T04sanss12u:162: evaṃ stry-āgāramadhyagatasyâpi te strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvādyagītatūryanādyair upagīyamānasya
T04sanss12u:163: sumanasaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato maraṇabhayabhītasyâtīva duṣkhadaurmanasyābhyāṃ
T04sanss12u:165: evam api te mahārāja gṛheṣûpalepanôpalipteṣu susthāpitârgaleṣu supihitavātâyaneṣu
T04sanss12u:169: punaś ca śṛgālakākagṛdhramṛtakaḍevaramāṃsâsthikeśarudhiravaśâkule paramabībhatse śmaśāne gataceṣṭasyâtmabhāvaḥ pṛthivyām avaśaḥ śeṣyate /
T04sanss12u:170: evam api te mahārāja gajaskandhâśvapṛṣṭharathâbhirūḍhasya śaṅkhapaṭaheṣv āhanyamāneṣu chatreṇa dhāryamāṇena bālavyajanena vījaya-
T04sanss12u:173: nirgamanam anubhūya na cirān niśceṣṭasya mṛtaśayanâbhirūḍhasya caturbhiḥ puruṣair
T04sanss12u:176: hā putra hā nātha hā tāta hā svāminn ity ākrandamānaiḥ paurajānapadaiḥ saparibhāvadṛśyamānasya
T04sanss12u:177: śmaśānaṃ nītasya punaḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālâdibhir bhakṣitasya tāny asthīny agninā
T04sanss12u:180: nitāni adbhir vā klinnāni vātâtāpavarṣair vā cūrṇīkṛtāni digvidikṣu prakṣiptāni tatrâiva pūtabhavam āyāsyanti /
T04sanss12u:182: tatra kleśāḥ prādhānyena rāgadveṣamohā yasyâiṣām ekatarasya tāvat pratipakṣam ādau bhāvayet tannidānaṃ ca varjayet //
T04sanss12u:191: yad uta santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvak māṃsâsthi snāyuḥ śirā vṛkkā hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ /
T04sanss12u:193: audaryakaṃ yakṛt purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleśmā pūyaṃ śoṇitaṃ mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgaṃ*prasrāvaḥ
T04sanss12u:196: yo 'pi tāvat syād bālo mūḍhaḥ abhavyo 'kuśalaḥ so 'pi tāvad etāni vastūni
T04sanss12u:202: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāra-
T04sanss12u:204: mitāyāṃ carann imam evaṃ kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T04sanss12u:205: tad yathâpi nāma subhūte goghātako vā goghātakântevāsī vā gāṃ hatvā tīkṣṇena śastreṇa catvāri phalakāni kṛtvā pratyavekṣate sthito 'thavā niṣaṇṇaḥ
T04sanss12u:206: evam eva subhūte bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyaṃ dhātuśo yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T04sanss12u:207: asty asmin kāye pṛthivīdhātur abdhātur api tejodhātur api vāyudhātur apîti /
T04sanss12u:210: tad yathâpi subhūte karṣakasya mūtoḍī pūrṇā nānādhānyānāṃ śālīnāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ mudrānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ yavānāṃ godhūmānāṃ maśūrāṇāṃ sarṣapāṇāṃ /
T04sanss12u:212: evaṃjātīyād ayaṃ śālir ayaṃ vrīhir amī tilâmī taṇḍulâmī mudrâmī māṣā yavâmī godhūmâmī maśūrâmī sarṣapêti //
T04sanss12u:213: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyam ūrddhvaṃ pādatalād
T04sanss12u:214: adhaḥ keśamastakanakharomatvak romaparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyâśucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T04sanss12u:215: santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā yāvan mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgam akṣigūthaṃ karṇagūtham iti //
T04sanss12u:217: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvaḥ śmaśānagataḥ paśyati nānārūpāṇi mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne
T04sanss12u:218: 'paviddhāni śavaśayane ujjhitāni ekâhamṛtāni vā dvyahamṛtāni vā tryahamṛtāni vā caturahamṛtāni vā pa-
T04sanss12u:220: ñcâhamṛtāni vā vyādhmātakāni vinīlakāni vipūyakāni vipaṭhyakāni /
T04sanss12u:224: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bahirdhā kāye kāyânudarśī viharati //
T04sanss12u:226: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni paśyati /
T04sanss12u:227: ṣaḍrātramṛtāni kākair vā khādyamānāni kurarair vā gṛdhrair vā śvabhir vā śṛgālair vā tato 'nyair vā nānāvidhaiḥ prāṇakajātaiḥ khādyamānāni
T04sanss12u:232: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni vikhāditāny aśucīni durgandhāni /
T04sanss12u:235: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalikāṃ māṃsaśoṇitamrakṣitāṃ snāyuvinibaddhāṃ /
T04sanss12u:236: sa tatrêmam eva kāyam iti pūrvavat //
T04sanss12u:237: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalībhūtāni apagatamāṃsaśoṇitasnāyubandhanāni /
T04sanss12u:239: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīni digvidikṣu kṣiptāni /
T04sanss12u:250: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīny anekavārṣikāṇi vātânupariśoṣitāni śaṅkhasannibhāni /
T04sanss12u:252: ayam api kāyâivaṃdharmâivaṃsvabhāvâitāṃ dharmatāṃ na vyativṛttae iti //
T04sanss12u:253: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām
T04sanss12u:254: asthīny anekavārṣikāṇi tirobhūtāni nīlāni kapotavarṇāni pūtīni cūrṇakajātāni pṛthivyāṃ
T04sanss12u:255: pāṃsunâsamasamībhūtāni sêmam eva kāyaṃ tatrôpasaṃharati ayam api kāyâivaṃdharmâivaṃsvabhāvaḥ /
T04sanss12u:260: tena vā saha bhojanâdyekârthatayâprītyutpādanaṃ tatra parasukhasyâśaṃsā prārthanā tṛṣṇâbhinandanaṃ maitrī /
T04sanss12u:268: punar buddhârambaṇā bodhisatvârambaṇā śrāvakapratyekabuddhârambaṇā satvârambaṇā ca /
T04sanss12u:269: tatra satvârambaṇāyāḥ pūrvaṃ priye satve hitasukhôpasaṃhārān na dhyānam abhyasya /
T04sanss12u:277: evaṃ yāvad ekāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvôpasaṃpadya viharati /
T04sanss12u:281: sa bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ caran yāvanti kānicid dṛśyante rūpāṇi manojñāni vā pratikūlāni vā /
T04sanss12u:282: evaṃ śabdā gandhā rasā spraṣṭavyā dharmā manojñā vā pratikūlā vā /
T04sanss12u:283: anavadyā viśuddhāḥ kalyāṇôdāraprabhāsvarā vā yena saumanasyaṃ jāyate /
T04sanss12u:295: sarvabuddhānām etayā pariṇāmanayā bhūyasyā mātrayā te buddhā bhagavanto 'cintyena
T04sanss12u:296: buddhavihārasukhena samanvāgatā bhavantv atulyena buddhasamādhisukhena susaṃgṛhītā
T04sanss12u:309: evaṃ bodhisatvas tatkuśalamūlaṃ tathāgateṣu pariṇamayya bodhisatveṣu pariṇamayati /
T04sanss12u:310: yad idam aparipūrṇānām abhiprāyāṇāṃ paripūrṇāya pariṇamayati /
T04sanss12u:320: sâivaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisatvānām arthāya pariṇamayya buddhaśāsanâvacareṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu tatkuśalamūlam evaṃ pariṇāmayati /
T04sanss12u:321: te kecit satvâikâcchaṭâsaṃhātamātram api buddhaśabdaṃ sṛṇvati /
T04sanss12u:322: dharmaśabdaṃ vâryasaṃghaparyupāsanaṃ vā kurvanti teṣāṃ tatkuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati buddhânusmṛtiparipūryai pariṇāmayati
T04sanss12u:332: śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu ca tathā bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatveṣu tatkuśala-
T04sanss12u:352: sarvam etad bodhisatvasya sarvajñatâlambanaprayuktasya na kiñcid apariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ
T04sanss12u:358: pe //antaśaḥ śvasv api tad anyeṣv api tiryagyonigateṣv ekâudanônmiñjitam ekâlopaṃ vā parityajati /
T04sanss12u:359: sugatāv upapattiṣu tat sarvaṃ teṣām eva hitāya teṣām eva parimocanāya pariṇāmayati /
T04sanss12u:360: tasyās tiryagyones tasmād duṣkhârṇavāt tasmād duṣkhôpādānāt tasmād duṣkhaskandhāt tasmād duṣkhāvedanāyāḥ /
T04sanss12u:363: rāt tasmād duṣkhanidānāt tato duṣkhamūlāt tasmād duṣkhâyatanāt teṣāṃ satvānāṃ vinivartanāya pariṇāmayati tadārambaṇena ca sarvasatvârambaṇīkaroti manasikaroti /
T04sanss12u:373: imāś ca suvarṇabhāsôktā maitrīkaruṇāgarbhā gāthāḥ sarvâdarataḥ samanvāhṛtya bhāvayitavyântaśo vacasâpi //
T04sanss12u:376: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā śāmyantu sarvavyasanāni loke /
T04sanss12u:377: bhavantu satvā hy abhayâhatā tathā yathâbhayāḥ śāntabhayāḥ munîndrāḥ //
T04sanss12u:379: tathâiva bhontū guṇasāgarāḥ prajāḥ samādhibodhyaṅgaguṇair upetāḥ //
T04sanss12u:380: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā bhavantu brahmasvara sarvasatvāḥ /
T04sanss12u:383: tiṣṭhantu kalpāni acintiyāni deśentu dharmaṃ jagato hitāya /
T04sanss12u:384: hanantu kleśān vidhamantu duṣkhān samentu rāgaṃ tatha doṣa moham //
T04sanss12u:386: śṛṇvantu te dundubhisaṃpravāditaṃ namo 'stu buddhāya bhaṇantu vācam //
T04sanss12u:387: jātismarāḥ satvā bhavantu sarve jātīśataṃ jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ /
T04sanss12u:388: anusmarantū satataṃ munîndrān śṛṇvantu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hy udāraṃ //
T04sanss12u:389: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā /
T04sanss12u:390: vivarjayantū khalu pāpakarma carantu kuśalāni śubhakriyāṇi //
T04sanss12u:391: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca duṣkhāḥ praśamantu loke /
T04sanss12u:392: ye satva vikalêndriyâṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi sakalêndriya bhontu sāṃpratam //
T04sanss12u:393: ye vyādhitā durbalakṣīṇagātrā nistrāṇabhūtāḥ śayitā diśāsu /
T04sanss12u:394: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cârogya balêndriyāṇi //
T04sanss12u:395: ye rājacaurabhaṭa tarjita vadhyaprāptā nānāvidhair bhayaśatair vyasanôpapannāḥ /
T04sanss12u:398: rvi satva vyasanâgataduṣkhitā hi mucyantu tair bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ //
T04sanss12u:400: ye tāḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu ca saṃsthitāhi /
T04sanss12u:402: te sarvi mucyantv iha bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyiṣu tāḍanebhyaḥ /
T04sanss12u:403: vadhyāś ca saṃyujyiṣu jīvitena vyasanâgatā nirbhaya bhontu sarve //
T04sanss12u:404: ye satva kṣuttarṣapipāsapīḍitā labhantu te bhojanapānacitram /
T04sanss12u:405: andhāś ca paśyantu vicitrarūpāṃ badhirāś ca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān //
T04sanss12u:406: nagnāś ca vastrāṇi labhantu citrāṃ daridrasatvāś ca nidhiṃ labhantu /
T04sanss12u:407: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnaiḥ sarve ca satvāḥ sukhino bhavantu //
T04sanss12u:408: mā kasyacid bhāvatu duṣkhavedanāḥ saukhyânvitāḥ satva bhavantu sarve /
T04sanss12u:410: manasânnapānāḥ susamṛddhapuṇyāḥ saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣāṃ /
T04sanss12u:411: vīṇā mṛdaṅgāḥ paṇavāḥ sughoṣakāḥ utsā sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ //
T04sanss12u:412: suvarṇapadmôtpalapadminīś ca saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣām /
T04sanss12u:413: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca vāsaś ca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ vicitram //
T04sanss12u:414: triṣkālavṛkṣebhi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te satva bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ /
T04sanss12u:415: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām //
T04sanss12u:417: sa bodhisatvān atha śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmasya bodhi pratisṛṣṭi tasya /
T04sanss12u:418: nīcāṃ gatiṃ satva vivarjayantu bhavantu aṣṭâkṣaṇavītivṛttāḥ //
T04sanss12u:419: āsādayantū jinarājam uttamaṃ labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā /
T04sanss12u:420: sarvā striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāś ca vīrā vidupaṇḍitāś ca //
T04sanss12u:421: te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pāramitāsu ṣaṭsu /
T04sanss12u:422: paśyantu buddhān daśasū diśāsu ratnadrumêndreṣu sukhôpaviṣṭān /
T04sanss12u:434: yad idam avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti /
T04sanss12u:435: avidyā cen nâbhaviṣyan nâiva saṃskārāḥ prājñāsyanta /
T04sanss12u:436: evaṃ yāvad yadi jātir nâbhaviṣyan na jarāmaraṇaṃ prājñāsyata /
T04sanss12u:437: atha satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati /
T04sanss12u:438: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati /
T04sanss12u:447: atha ca satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
T04sanss12u:448: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ //
T04sanss12u:453: yad idaṃ pṛthivy-aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyād ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayôpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //
T04sanss12u:455: yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
T04sanss12u:456: yaḥ kāyasyânuparigrahaṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti ayam ucyate 'bdhātuḥ /
T04sanss12u:457: yaḥ kāyasyâśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayam ucyate tejodhātuḥ /
T04sanss12u:461: yaḥ kāyasyântaḥsauṣiryabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate ākāśadhātuḥ /
T04sanss12u:462: yo nāmarūpam abhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ sâsravaṃ ca manovijñānam ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ //
T04sanss12u:464: yadâdhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur avikalo bhavaty evam aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaś câvikalā bhavanti /
T04sanss12u:480: atha ca satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyôtpattir bhavati /
T04sanss12u:481: tatra pṛthivīdhātur nâtmā na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ /
T04sanss12u:485: evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur na satvo na jīvo na
T04sanss12u:486: jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na câhaṃ na mama na câpy anyasya kasyacit //
T04sanss12u:488: yâiṣv eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣv ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñâtmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā /
T04sanss12u:493: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
T04sanss12u:494: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārêti /
T04sanss12u:497: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni côpādāyôpādāya r ūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tan nāmarūpaṃ /
T04sanss12u:513: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā /
T04sanss12u:520: puṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss12u:521: apuṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss12u:522: āniñjyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss12u:527: ṣaḍbhyâyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśêty ucyate /
T04sanss12u:528: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
T04sanss12u:534: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti /
T04sanss12u:537: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā /
T04sanss12u:539: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate /
T04sanss12u:540: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati /
T04sanss12u:552: atha cêmāny asya dvādaśâṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
T04sanss12u:563: asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyâbhinirvṛttir na bhavati //
T04sanss12u:570: vijñānabījasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavaty aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janitêti /
T04sanss12u:577: sa ca nāmarūpâṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nôbhayakṛto nêśvarâdinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na câikakāraṇâdhīno nâpy ahetusamutpannaḥ /
T04sanss12u:578: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādânupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpâṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati
T04sanss12u:579: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
T04sanss12u:580: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate /
T04sanss12u:582: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ câlokaṃ câkāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca pratītyôtpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ //
T04sanss12u:589: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss12u:604: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyôtpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
T04sanss12u:606: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
T04sanss12u:614: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrôtpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpâṅkuram abhinirvartayati /
T04sanss12u:615: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
T04sanss12u:616: tan nâdhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ //
T04sanss12u:622: na tu yae eva māraṇântikāḥ skandhās tae evâupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā /
T04sanss12u:623: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānâupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti /
T04sanss12u:626: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nâpy aniruddheṣu /
T04sanss12u:627: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante 'upapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti /
T04sanss12u:631: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
T04sanss12u:642: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputrêmaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ
T04sanss12u:643: yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam
T04sanss12u:644: abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham anāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam avyupaśamam
T04sanss12u:646: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmanaś ca samanupaśyati /
T04sanss12u:648: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nâbhūvam atīte 'dhvani /
T04sanss12u:651: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvani /
T04sanss12u:654: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ /
T04sanss12u:676: hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvâsya saṃyogasyâsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo /
